inclusion.criterion: Aged over 18 years Diagnosed with a hematologic-oncologic disease Admitted within the first 24 hours to the ICU
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: the first 24 hours of the ICU admission will be randomly separated two arm (n = 30 for each arm) and bath applications will be performed.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: < 18 years, burns to >20% of the total skin surface, pregnancy, previous MRSA and/or VRE infection history or antibiotic use for these infections, receiving radiation therapy, admitted before 24 hours to ICU, re-admission to ICU, diagnosed with severe septic shock, massive pulmonary thromboembolism, massive haemoptysis, and status epilepticus etc., general condition disorder.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 55yo woman with h/o ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis who presented with watery, non bloody diarrhea and weakness. She has a history of 2 prior C diff infections, the most recent just 1 month ago.
